product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Pour Over Coffee Dripper - Reusable Double Layer Mesh Filter and Coffee Scoop with Bag Clip
product_meta.description:
Why choose a coffee dripper? 
- All of the essential oils and flavor end up in your cup 
- Complete control over the brewing process 
- Pour water over all of the grounds evenly 
- Never buy paper filters again 
- Cleanup is quick and easy 
- Impress your family and friends with best cup of coffee they've ever had

How to make the perfect cup 
1. Start by boiling water to 195-205 degrees Fahrenheit 
2. Grind coffee - Use a burr grinder for the most consistent grind 
3. Scoop grinds into the filter - 2 scoops for every 6oz of water 
4. Place filter over cup and shake so grounds are a flat surface 
5. Pour water over grounds until they are completely covered and then wait until the water has filtered through 
6. Repeat the process while pouring in a circular motion over the grounds 
7. Allow all of the water to filter through, wait up to a minute to ensure you've captured all of the coffee from the dripper
